It?s a year that many have prophesied will bring a catastrophic end
to life as we know it. Whatever is in store - a massive cosmic
collision, a global environmental disaster, an Armageddon-like
religious showdown, or a more subtle transformation - many believe
that 2012 will mark a major shift in the history of our planet. But
what is there to substantiate such fears?

A detailed, historical investigation of this chilling prophecy is the
mission of Nostradamus 2012, an exciting history special that casts
the doomsday warning in a frighteningly modern context.

December 21, 2012 is bearing down on us with alarming speed. Whether
or not we are able to collectively heed the warnings and affect a
course to avert disaster may be the defining moment of the modern age.

for more detail info see:

I watched a video when I was in middle school in 1989 where Nostradamus predicted 9/11/01.  We all thought it was Saddam Hussein back then but Nostradamus said specifically that the person that planned the attack would wear a "blue turban".  Hussein didn't, Bin Ladin did. 

Look for the old videos before 2001 and it'll freak you out how specific he was.  Since he predicted a problem in 2012 and not the end of the world, I think the movie should be entertaining but hyped up to scare people like "The Day After Tomorrow" or "Armageddon".

If you are having trouble downloading...

Check your network connections. If you see an internet gateway icon right click it. Check the display icon when connected box in the bottom left. Then click the properties button in the bottom right. Look for the program you are using to download. If it's not listed you can add it. Click on the program then click edit. Make sure the port that you have forwarded with your router matches that listed here. Then click ok. Now you should be able to download again. Cox recently made changes so you will have to use the internet gateway to connect to the internet. And you will have to configure it to open ports. If you don't see the internet gateway icon in the network connections, try resetting the modem. Watch for it to appear then right click it. I hope this helps people.

The exact date the world will "end" is December 21st, 2012.

However, the world itself isn't going to end. The world AS WE KNOW IT, will end. Major shifts in political and military administration, the fall of the catholic church, the dissolution of the status quo... All these things may seem like armageddon to those who languish in the lap of luxury, where these kinds of shifts will overturn their power and/or make their wealth worthless.

The so-called "end of the world" is just a time of major, dramatic, society altering events. They can be lots of small events that lead to something greater, and do not necessarily have to be one giant cataclysmic event, such as are shown in this movie.

But, it's still damn cool to watch the world being destroyed.

I am saddened by all the negativity I read here. Maybe the end is coming. Maybe it is far away. One thing I am certain of. If we don't learn to put aside our differences and love all humanity , we are doomed. That is the truth. And your immortal souls cannot deny it even if your human mind can somehow rationalize the negativity that you are propogating. I live in the United States , and I am fully aware of our failures and the seemingly unaware masses of "robot" minds I am forced to live with. But we are really no different than any culture on the planet. And none of it really matters. All that matters is what we have learned and how we apply it in a positive manner going forward. I love you all. And I wish only peace to the world , because if we do not come together , all hope is lost. It doesn't matter what you call your God , we have one creator. We are divided only by fear. We can overcome it with faith and love.
